sentence.Network_en: These ships were all numbered with the suffix LBK.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些船都有编号，末尾都是LBK。

sentence.Network_en: All employees will refer to each other by the honorific suffix "san".
sentence.Network_cn: 所有雇员相互称呼时都须在名字后添加敬语san（日语表示“先生”，“女士”）。

sentence.Network_en: The suffix " ist " can be added to'sex " to form the word'sexist ".
sentence.Network_cn: 后缀ist加在 sex 之后可构成sexist一词.

加后缀（suffix）：另外还有一个在英语中比较罕见的中缀（infix），如abso-bloody-lutely中的bloody被认为是中缀。中缀在拉丁语中 …
字尾(Suffix)加在字根(root)后，不单可以变成不同的意思，还把字的词类(word class)也改变了。 　很多字尾是把形容词(adjective)或动词.

英语前缀、后缀和词根 ... Suffix 后缀 Adjective Suffixes 形容词后缀 Adverb Suffixes 副词后缀.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (as a noun): from modern Latin suffixum, neuter past participle (used as a noun) of Latin suffigere, from sub- 'subordinately' + figere 'fasten'

entry.def: A suffix is a letter or group of letters, for example '-ly' or '-ness', which is added to the end of a word in order to form a different word, often of a different word class. For example, the suffix '-ly' is added to 'quick' to form 'quickly'.
A suffix is one or more numbers or letters added to the end of a code number to indicate, for example, what area something belongs to.

example.ex: These ships were all numbered with the suffix LBK.
example.tran: 这些船都有编号，末尾都是 LBK。

means.word_mean: 1. an affix that is added at the end of the word

stems_affixes.type_exp: 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"

stems_affixes.word_buile: suf在下面;随后+fici做+ent……的→在下面先做好,用的时候→足够的
suf在下面;随后+fix固定→在后面固定→后缀
suf在下面;随后+fer带→带到下面去→受苦
suf在下面;随后+foc喉咙+ate表动词→把[手]放喉咙下→窒息
suf在下面;随后+fuse流→流下去→流遍,染遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 固定设备;预定日期;比赛时间;定期存款
stems_affixes.word_buile: fix固定+ture表名词→n.固定设备;预定日期;比赛时间;定期存款
pre前+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
suf后+fix固定→在后面固定→后缀

sentences.en: The suffix “ist” can be added to “sex” to form the word “sexist”.
sentences.cn: 后缀ist加在sex之后可构成sexist一词。
